title: display doesn't work correctly after turning off
content:
So I recently had my phone screen fixed,

After getting it back it appears to work okay, I can use everything, make/take calls, etc.

However, upon turning the screen off and turning it on again, the screen doesn't work correctly every time I touch the screen it registers it as if I'm swiping down on the screen and I have to power it off completely for it to work correctly again.
